### Chart B

```{r}
renderTable({
      file <- input$file1
      ext <- tools::file_ext(file$datapath)
      
      req(file)
      validate(need(ext == "xlsx", "Please upload a csv file"))
      
      data_ <- read_xlsx(file$datapath)
      data_
    })
```

### Chart C

```{r}
renderDT({
  datatable(read_xlsx(file$datapath), extensions = "Bottons", options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                                                          bottons = c('copy', 'csv', 'print'),
                                                          lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),c(10, 25, 50, "All"))))
})
```
